analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.8 (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of AgoraToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#49-50) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of AgoraToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#54-55) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of AgoraToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#55) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of AgoraToken.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#77) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of AgoraToken.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#77-78) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of AgoraToken.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of AgoraToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#104) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of AgoraToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#104-106) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of AgoraToken.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#114-116) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of AgoraToken.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#116) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of AgoraToken.registerBalanceForReference (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#178) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of AgoraToken.balanceAtBlock (/unique_contracts/0x2f5e044ad4adac34c8d8df738fac7743eda1409c.sol#196-197) is not in mixedCase
